TopicTitle: K What gives? NONE of the links work, they all default tot he main forum list

Articles.Content:
Hello, new here, and trying to get some addons! What gives with all the links not working?

post a link, I bet it doesn't work. Unless it me, omg is it me? what does it mean!?#%@

Hi there tsakali,

Recently the forums migrated to vBulletin from another forum provider. Unfortunately, due to their slight differences, many of the older links posted don't work, new ones do however.

As for finding add-ons, you can always use the search function of the forum, or just browse through here.

Thanks and welcome to the forums!

hey thx for the quick reply. Yeah I've been searching through it, but some of the named mods (with no links, or good links provided) I can't even google as a workaround because of the broken links. Anyway, atleast it's not me, phew.

The easiest way to search is to go to the Addons forum. Then use the "Forum Search" dropdown just above the blue bar. That will search only in that forum and it's subforums. If you use the search at the top of the page, it always searches the entire site giving you a whole bunch of hits that aren't really what you're looking for.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
